locations.name: Male Atoll
locations.description: Located near the Maldivian capital, offering convenience and the iconic overwater villa experience with direct lagoon access. Known for vibrant house reefs and proximity to Male.

locations.name: Baa Atoll
locations.description: A UNESCO Biosphere Reserve famed for incredible biodiversity, especially manta rays at Hanifaru Bay (seasonal). Offers exceptional diving, powder-soft beaches, and a sense of untouched natural beauty.
